instructions: Pour chocolate syrup into a highball glass.

name: Bubbletart
instructions: Strain into a highball glass with ice.

name: Crow'S Nest
instructions: Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice.

name: Creamsicle
instructions: Put orange juice and vanilla ice cream in blender.

name: Innocent Passion
instructions: Pour juices into a highball glass filled with ice.
Add a cherry and a long straw.

name: Lava Flow
instructions: Pour light cream, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and banana into a blender with ice.
Put strawberries in the bottom of a parfait glass.
Quickly pour in fruit and cream mixture for a starburst effect.

name: Peach Melba
instructions: Blend at low speed until smooth.

name: Blackberry Soft Drink
instructions: Mix blackberries, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker.

name: Carlota
instructions: Pour juices into a highball glass with ice.

name: Texas Bbq
instructions: With lime juice, rim a highball glass with cajun spices.
Add Worcestershire sauce, tomato juice, barbecue sauce, and lime wedge.

name: Virgin Hurricane
instructions: Build orange juice, sour mix, passion fruit syrup, and grenadine into a highball glass with ice.

name: Virgin Seabreeze
instructions: Strain into a highball glass packed with ice.

name: Little Pinkie
instructions: Build ingredients in a highball glass with ice.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Chapala
instructions: Add orange juice, grenadine, salt, and cayenne pepper.
Strain into a highball glass over ice.

name: Orange Smile
instructions: Fill cocktail shaker with three ice cubes.
Add egg, grenadine, and orange juice.

name: Kon-Tiki
instructions: Add milk, pineapple juice, orange ice cream, and vanilla.
Garnish with a chunk of pineapple.

name: Cafe Mocha
instructions: Pour coffee and hot chocolate into a large mug.

name: Johnny Appleseed
instructions: Blend juices, vanilla ice cream, and club soda in a blender until smooth.

name: Toots
instructions: Blend sherbet, chocolate ice cream, and orange soda until smooth.

name: Strawberry Wonderland
instructions: Add coconut cream, strawberries, pineapple, sour mix, and ice.
Pour into a large brandy snifter.

name: Santa'S Little Helper
instructions: Pour lemonade, lime juice, raspberry sorbet, vanilla ice cream, soda, grenadine, and ice into a blender.
Blend all ingredients until smooth and thick.

name: Prairie Oyster
instructions: Add Worcestershire sauce, vinegar, pepper, and tomato catsup.
Drop in egg yolk without breaking yolk.

name: Absinthe Suissesse
instructions: Pour Pernod, orgeat, egg white, cream, and ice into a blender.
Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

name: Aussie Eye-Opener For Two
instructions: Use a juice extractor to process the grapefruit, pineapple, and lemon.
Pour juices into a cocktail shaker.
Pour into tumblers. (Serve over ice if preferred.)

name: Bananarama
instructions: Pour whole milk, honey, heavy cream, banana, and ice into a blender.
